title: Boost Your PostgreSQL Performance With Auto Chunk Size Recommendations
author: Team Timescale
description: Our UI tooling addition, Chunk Size Recommendations helps you boost Postgres performance by finely tuning your hypertable configs.
cntitle: 通过自动块大小推荐提升PostgreSQL性能
cndescription: 我们的UI工具新增功能“Chunk Size 建议”可帮助您微调 hypertable 配置，从而提升 Postgres 性能。
